subject: UAP-MCP-001 COMPLETED: MCP Task Management Tools
content:
MCP server expanded with 3 core task management tools:

Tools Added:
- get_tasks(status, assignee): Query task database with filters
- claim_task(task_id, agent_id): Atomic task claiming from BACKLOG
- update_task_status(task_id, status, final_status): Update task state

Location: src/agentic/mcp_server.py
Status: DEPLOYED (syntax validated)
Total Tools: 5 (hello_world, create_spec_kit, get_tasks, claim_task, update_task_status)

External agents can now:
1. List available tasks
2. Claim tasks atomically
3. Update task progress

Next: Agent registry implementation (UAP-REGISTRY-001)
Testing with MCP client recommended.

Claude Code
